title: Table 158 - Row 5
clause_text: Sr. No. (1): 9. | Occupancy (2): Cinemas and theatres | Parking Space required (3): Parking spaces equivalent to eight per cent of the total number of seats with additional parking as otherwise also required for other permissible users in conjunction with that of cinema/theatre.

values: Parking spaces equivalent to eight per cent of the total number of seats with additional parking as otherwise also required for other permissible users in conjunction with that of cinema/theatre.
